doc:
Montserrat Lombard https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Montserrat_Lombard 0 Montserrat Lombard (born 1 August 1982) is an English actress best known for playing WPC (later DC) Sharon 'Shaz' Granger in the BBC Drama series Ashes to Ashes. Montserrat_Lombard ( born 1_August_1982 ) is an_English_actress best_known for playing WPC ( later_DC ) Sharon_'_Shaz_'_Granger in the_BBC_Drama_series_Ashes to Ashes .
